sentences.english: The system can even be used to spot rip currents in real time.

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.

sentences.english: The invention discloses a device and a method for real-time stream file storage.

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.

sentences.chinese: 但是，一些消耗在于硬实时和不仅仅是读操作屏障。

sentences.english: Cook up some automatically generated graphs for your organizational meetings or live enterprise directory data.
sentences.chinese: 为公司会议或实时企业目录数据打造自动生成的图表。

sentences.english: Thepath is capable of realizing real-time input, output and processing.
sentences.chinese: 它可以完成图象的实时输入，输出及处理。

sentences.english: Currently, algorithms based on graph cut take pixels as vertexes, therefore, real-time of segmentation is poor.
sentences.chinese: 由于加权图的顶点规模较大，因此分割实时性较差。

sentences.chinese: 本文还提出了传感器时间常数的实时递推计算方法。

sentences.chinese: 计算机仿真和实时控制实验证实了该算法的有效性。

sentences.english: In this paper, we brief the basic principle of multiple wavelengths ADI that is also called fractional fringe measurement.
